p.span: Due to an order issued April 16 by Gov. Andrew Cuomo, all K-12 schools will remain closed until at least May 15. The closure order is part of a proactive effort to limit exposure to the Coronavirus.

div.span: Due to an order issued April 16 by Gov. Andrew Cuomo, all K-12 schools will remain closed until at least May 15. The closure order is part of a proactive effort to limit exposure to the Coronavirus.

span.div: Our P.E. teachers put together a fun video for students to help inspire them to keep moving every day!

br.span: Attention current sophomores and juniors: Visions Credit Union is looking to hire student interns for the UEHS branch for the 2020-2021 school year
Since school closures back in March, the district has provided food to our U-E families. In addition, two students took it a step further and helped to provide feminine hygiene supplies.
U-E continues to celebrate our seniors, recognizing them and their future plans. #TigerPride! Click here to see photos.
"U.S. News" released its Best High Schools rankings. Click here to see UEHS stats and placings.
Click here to see a video about the JFS Ambassador program.
If you are in need of nutrition assistance, help is available.
We are celebrating our Tiger Seniors, Class of 2020. Click here to see photos and where they are heading! #TigerPride #UEClassof2020

JFS 8th grade trip to Washington, DC May 7th through May 9th, 2020.
The bus will leave JFS at 6:00am on Thursday, May 7th
The bus will return to JFS approximately 10:00pm on Saturday, May 9th

span.br: The mission of the Union-Endicott School community is to develop students who are responsible, self-directed, involved, lifelong learners. The students, staff, parents, and community encourage learners to develop a deeper understanding of self, a respect for others and an understanding of their place in the world community.
